page.title: 11Our VIsit to Rock Farm
page.content: We visited{Rock Farm}because the people who own it follow the{Rudolf {Steiner}educational principles and have opened their home to provide a settled environment and training centre for mentally handicapped teenagers. The house is over 250 years old,some ceiling beams came from fighting ships. The farm has only 8 acres of land now but the young people care for the land and animals as part of their therapy. They grow vegetables and keep hens and cows. One girl was making wholemeal bread, one was making butter. They study various crafts and have helpers who stay for up to a year before beginning their training. The owners hope the young people will learn enough social skills to be able to live in a sheltered home with other mentally handicapped adults.
